name: Strawberry Spinach Salad III
author: Karen David
summary: This is a spinach salad tossed with strawberries and toasted sesame seeds. Everyone who has tried it always ask for the recipe. My husband waited one year to taste it and now he loves it! You may substitute mandarin oranges and toasted almonds for the strawberries and sesame seeds.
ingredients: 10 ounces fresh spinach - chopped, washed and dried
directions: In a large bowl, combine the spinach, dill and strawberries
In a large glass jar with tight fitting lid, combine the oil, vinegar, sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, black pepper, dry mustard and cayenne pepper
Shake well until sugar is dissolved
Pour dressing over chilled fruit and greens; toss to coat and sprinkle with sesame seeds
